segments.text: Excuse me , could you tell me how to get to the school clinic ? I've lost my way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Go straight ahead till you come to the traffic lights , turn left there and it's the first turning on the right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Straight ahead to the traffic lights , left and then right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's it . It'll take you about five minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
